unicef-ch13.def: Percentage of children under age 5 who had diarrhoea in the two weeks preceding the survey and who received oral rehydration salts (ORS packets or pre−packaged ORS fluids).
unicef-ch13.name: Diarrhea treatment with oral rehydration salts
unicef-ch13.source: DHS, MICS and other national household surveys. Last update: January 2021.
unicef-ch13.dataset: DHS, MICS and other national household surveys. Last update: January 2021.
